member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController
member.summary: Controls a , implements the basic services to support async calculation.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.EtcItemKey
member.summary: Key for the “More” item in the menu.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.ItemsGottenDirty
member.summary: Fires when the collection is considered dirty and should be recalculated by the implementing model. Listens for changes in all the affecting properties, groups them, and then fires this aggregate signal.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.FuncEtcItemExecute
member.summary: If the action is available, then the that's added to the end of the list if there're too many items to show is enabled and can be executed. Also, a toolbar button is present to execute this same action. Executes on the primary thread.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.IsComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the data for the controller to produce the items from is complete. Affects the property that is True only when and no async action is running. You cannot set the directly, alter this property value instead.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.IsNotRunningAsyncAction
member.summary: Reflects the internal async state.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.#ctor(JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameModel)
member.summary: Creates the controller and attaches to the model. The controller lifetime is also synchronized to the model lifetime. That is, when the model is disposed of, the controller is also disposed of (but not the other way).

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.CreateEtcItem
member.summary: The “more…” item at the end of the truncated list.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.BeforeUpdateItems
member.summary: When the items get dirty (), this function is called on the UI thread right before the thing. The base implementation clears the collection.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.ExecuteItem(JetBrains.UI.PopupMenu.Impl.JetPopupMenuItem)
member.summary: Called when an item is to be executed.
When the items get dirty (), this function is called on the secondary thread. The function should be checking for every so often.
member.param: The filtering string against which the items list should be produced.
Call from time to time, on True, abort immediately.
A function you can use to add items to the output collection in a thread-safe manner. The function checks for the items limit and returns whether more items can be added.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.Init_AsyncAction
member.summary: Starts watching for the model's getting dirty. Contains the code for spawning the async recalculation of the items.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.InternalExecuteItem(JetBrains.UI.PopupMenu.Impl.JetPopupMenuItem)
member.summary: Relays the to the method, filtering out the execution.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.Model
member.summary: The data part of the thing.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.AddItemsBehavior
member.summary: Defines what the funcAddItems parameter of the function should do.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.AddItemsBehavior.Append
member.summary: Appends a new item or items to the existing items list.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.AddItemsBehavior.Replace
member.summary: Replaces all the items in the list with the new ones.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.AsyncState.Idle
member.summary: There are no async operations running. If needed, one could be started right away, and switch to .

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.AsyncState.Running
member.summary: An async operation is currently running. When it completes, we'd go . If the model gets dirty before the operation completes, we set the state (so that funcIsCancelled starts returning True for the async operation), and wait for the state to become before running a new operation.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.AsyncState.Cancelling
member.summary: The async operation were running when the model state was invalidated. This state holds until the async operation terminates, after which a new one is spawned automatically.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.GoToByName.GotoByNameController.AsyncState.Disposed
member.summary: When the user dismisses the GotoByName UI, the pending async operation should be cancelled. This is the terminal state.

member.summary: An edit-like control for placing on the dialog boxes that picks a type name from a tree or completion list.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CommitCompletionListInputString
member.summary: Immediately commits the to the completion lists's model. Wired to the deferred binding when the completion list menu is lazy-created.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListExecuteSelectedItem
member.summary: Exec sel menu item, if any. Returns exec success flag ().

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListSelectNextItem
member.summary: Selects the next item in the completion drop-down list, eg when up/down arrows are used in the edit box.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.IsCompletionListVisible
member.summary: Gets whether we've ruled out that the completion list should be visible at the moment. This means is and the 's are not empty (and the model exists, in the first place).

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.myBtnTreeMouseDownAcquired
member.summary: We open the tree on mouse-down (in which case the click event should be ignored), but in case the button is triggered by keyboard, the click should be processed.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.myEvtUpdateTextBeforeCaret
member.summary: As we can't (so it seems) get the event of caret movement in the edit box, we'd udpate it every so often. Probably the caret position can't change without a Windows message on the control, so we'd apply the change after each message, with a small delay needed just to group multiple consequent messages together. GEvent is better than BeginInvoke because the latter adds to the messages itself and cannot guarantee all fo the dependent messages go thru before it executes.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CaretPosition
member.summary: Gives out the current caret position in the edit box, or the selection start position.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowMode
member.summary: Whether the completion list is allowed to be shown at the moment. Other filters could apply (eg will not be actually visible if there are no items).

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the settings that define the behavior of the picker, like what it picks and which functionality is available. Can be set only once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the editbox the user is typing.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.TextBeforeCaret
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the editbox the user is typing, up to the current caret position or the selection start. Could be used as the completion prefix.

member.summary: If menu is shown, selects the given item and applies its text.

member.summary: Shows the completion list, either the soft or the hard way. Modifies based on its present value and the . Eg a soft-show won't actually show if currently in mode.

member.summary: Implements menu lazy-creation. Does nothing if already created.

member.summary: The completion list could be visible if other factors (like items>0) are met.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModes.HideSoft
member.summary: The completion list has been hidden indeliberately, and should transition to when there's an excuse.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModes.HideHard
member.summary: The completion list has been focibly hidden. Should not show again unless explicitly requested by the user.

member.summary: Flag for transitioning between .

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModeTransition.Soft
member.summary: Switches softly, cannot break . This is for handling implicit activities.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerEdit.CompletionListShowModeTransition.Hard
member.summary: Switches forcibly, always transitions to the desired state. Must be done on explicit user actions only.

member.summary: Specifies the configuration for the control.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerSettings.CompletionModel
member.summary: Gets or sets the flat model that works for completing the text you type into the control. Can be set only once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerSettings.ExpandPickerItem
member.summary: When the tree picker is building its model, supplies the items for the next level. Fill the list with the children of , who must not be Null. When is Null, root items are requested.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerSettings.PickerItemPresenter
member.summary: Gets or sets the presenter for the picker (drop-down tree) items. This value can only be set once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerSettings.TranslateCompletionItem
member.summary: When a completion list item is executed, its text is inserted into the edit box. In case the text should be modified before insertion (eg FQN instead of a short name), this event should be sinked.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerSettings.TranslatePickerItem
member.summary: When a picker tree item is executed, its text is inserted into the edit box. In case the text should be modified before insertion (eg FQN instead of a short name), this event should be sinked. Setting the to Null prevents the item from being picked (eg for group nodes that are only present to hold the child elements).

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerSettings.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerTreeDropDown.GetDesiredSize(JetBrains.UI.IGraphicsContainer,System.Drawing.Size)
member.summary: Performs the bottom-up layouting stage, when the control calculates its desired size using the given constraints. Should give generally the same results as , but could employ the device context for the sake of optimization.
member.param: The device context to measure against.

The maximum available space (that could affect the shape of the control, or strip down unnecessary calculations over the invisible items). May be a with width and height equal to , which means that the size is not limited.
member.returns: The desired size, must be no larger than .

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerTreeDropDown.SetLayout(JetBrains.UI.LayoutResult)
member.summary: Tells the control the details about the new layout applied to it by the controlling entity in conjunction with some . Typically, the control need not apply the given size and location because that should be done by the controlling entity. The control may change its presentation in response to the layouting details, for example, whether it's attached to the top or the bottom of the anchoring rect.
member.param: The layouting details.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerTreeDropDown.Settings
member.summary: Gets the settings that define the tree and some of its interactions.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerTreeDropDown.ShowWithoutActivation
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the window will be activated when it is shown.
member.returns: True if the window will not be activated when it is shown; otherwise, false. The default is false.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerTreeDropDown.AutoActivate
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control should be activated initially when it's shown. The typical implementation for a form is to return a negative of this value from the override.

member.name: P:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.CompletionPickerTreeDropDown.WantsResize
member.summary: Fires when the control would like to be reasked of its desired size.

member.summary: Gets or sets the filter that narrows down the completion items (in the completion menu). Can be assigned only once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.Features.Common.UI.DeclaredElementChooser.PickerItemsPassFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets the filter that narrows down the picker items (in the drop-down picker tree). This is usually a superset of the items, as it has to include the nodes that contain the useful items. Items under the excluded nodes are excluded automatically. Can be assigned only once.
